team.title: Led by
team.description: Our team is dedicated to helping you succeed in your wealth-building journey.

teamSection.title: Earn More By
teamSection.description: Expand your agent team to earn manager bonuses and promotion rewards. Move up from Level 1 to Level 12.
teamSection.whyHelpDesc: When you help someone on your team achieve their financial goals, you do not just feel good about it. You also earn additional income from their success. It is a true win-win model.
teamSection.benefit1Desc: When you help someone on your team succeed, you earn additional income from their success
teamSection.benefit2Desc: No cap on how much you can earn. The more people you help succeed, the more you earn
teamSection.benefit3Desc: Build a team that generates ongoing income even when you are not actively working
teamSection.trainingDesc: Learn how to build and support your team
teamSection.teamSupportDesc: Never work alone, always have backup
